title: Apple TV+ deal with Skydance reportedly ‘among the richest’ as service builds out movie catalog
content:
Apple is in the works scaling its movie business on its Apple TV+ service. Its deal with Paramount Pictures partner Skydance Media has been the buzz around Hollywood as of late. 

more…

The post Apple TV+ deal with Skydance reportedly ‘among the richest’ as service builds out movie catalog appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is clearly interested in scaling its movie business on its Apple TV+ service after announcing its deal with Skydance.
